org.jfree.chart
Class DrawableLegendItem

java.lang.Object
  org.jfree.chart.DrawableLegendItem
public class DrawableLegendItem
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a single item within a legend.

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
